item.description: CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1570; 09:20PM; 4275 N Via Arbolada; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nTBhzA; Montecito Heights; 64 firefighters achieved containment of the 1/4 acre fire and stopped all forward progress with no injuries reported. Some resources and being released and the remaining crews will remain on scene approximately one hour conducting mop up operations.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC10 BC5 E11 E16 E2 E202 E212 E25 E29 E290 E44 E47 E55 E90 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 RH114 T12 T90; CH5; 15; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#1570; 08:38PM; 4260 N Via Arbolada; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nTBhzA; Montecito Heights; Approximately 1/4 acre of grass and heavy brush burning; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC10 BC5 E11 E16 E2 E202 E212 E25 E29 E290 E44 E47 E55 E90 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 RH114 T12 T90; CH5; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1480; 08:10PM; 4800 S Alameda St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3l6ft1J; Central-Alameda; With just over 100 firefighters assigned, this incident is at the Greater Alarm status. All operations are defensive on the large structure adjoining 4 different buildings. One of the structures sustained a roof collapse. Two additional task forces requested. LAFD PIO Captain Cody Weireter is enroute for media availability. ; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC2 BC4 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E203 E209 E21 E210 E221 E233 E266 E3 E33 E66 E9 EA1 EM1 EM13 HR3 RA17 RA21 RA814 SQ21 T10 T21 T3 T33 T66 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1480; 07:48PM; 4800 S Alameda St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3l6ft1J; Central-Alameda; Large (approximately 100' x 800' one and two story commercial building with heavy fire showing. This is a previous burn from 11.23.21 and the structure is filled with densely packed textiles. Additional resources were requested and are reflected in this alert.; FS 21; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 BC2 BC4 CM22 E10 E14 E17 E203 E209 E21 E210 E221 E233 E266 E3 E33 E9 EM1 HR3 RA21 RA814 SQ21 T10 T21 T3 T33 T66 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 14; Margaret Stewart

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1168; 04:52PM; 16010 W Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3l5jXpu; Sylmar; The fire is contained and all forward progress halted with no structures damaged and no reported injuries. Most LAFD resources will be released with those remaining on scene conducting mop up operations. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC15 CE84 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E290 E298 E7 E8 E90 E91 EM15 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 RA7 RA90 T75 T87 T90 T98 WT77; CH5; 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#1168; 04:52PM; 16010 W Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3l5jXpu; Sylmar; Firefighters are making good progress, nearing stoppage of any forward progress. The fire is held between road systems. No structures are threatened. All LA Co FD resources are canceled and incident will be handled by LAFD.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC15 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E290 E298 E7 E8 E90 E91 EM15 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 RA7 RA90 T75 T87 T90 T98; CH5; 18; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#1168; 04:35PM; 16010 W Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3l5jXpu; Sylmar; Approximately 2 acres of brush burning at a moderate rate of speed with winds out of the north at 10-15mph. Additional resources enroute per this alert ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E18 E275 E287 E290 E298 E7 E90 E91 EM15 H0A H0E RA7 T75 T87 T90 T98 H4 H3; CH5; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0780; 12:52PM; 8929 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cNYBso; Gramercy Park; KNOCKDOWN: 58 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the detached structure (garage?) at the alley to the rear of the address. There are hose lines (4" diameter supply lines) across the road at Western x 91s, please avoid the streets while DOT gets resources in place. No further details.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E221 E226 E233 E264 E266 E33 E57 E65 E66 E95 RA57 RA66 RA857 T21 T26 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0780; 12:32PM; 8929 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cNYBso; Gramercy Park; One story row of commercial units with fire showing from a detached structure at the rear of this address. There is at least one additional building exposed.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E226 E264 E266 E33 E57 E66 RA57 RA857 T26 T64 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0734; 12:39PM; 11950 N Lopez Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DVayIr; Lake View Terrace; All forward progress stopped and size held to approximately 1/2 acre. The fire is in USFS (FRA) land under ANF jurisdiction. LAFD resources will remain on scene to assist with mop up operations. No injuries reported and no structures damaged. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 BP74 CM42 E11 E18 E2 E24 E274 E275 E287 E289 E29 E60 E7 E77 E90 EM14 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 RA98 RH114 T74 T75 T87 T89 WT77; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart
